sense.name: attempt
sense.commentary: endeavor, endeavour, try - earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something (count noun)
sense.examples: He made an effort to cover all of the reading material for the class. She gave a good effort. The book was her finest effort.

sense.name: exertion
sense.commentary: elbow grease, travail, sweat - use of physical or mental energy; hard work (mass noun)
sense.examples: He got an A for effort. They managed only with great effort.
